column5: after 4 beers i got curious to how many lakes there wore in Ontario little bit of Google search and found this  Ontario is home to approximately 250,000 bodies of water that are classified as lakes. The exact number is unknown. Nearly 4,000 of these are larger than 3Km2. Most are found in the northern portion of the province  how true this is i don't know i have just an average folding map  Randy manically Ontario easy finder lost count after 100 lakes. (6th beer in)  now my question is to you guys how many lakes have you personally fished ?  here is what i have fished, lake Ontario. little lake, rice lake and pitching flipping in  the kitchen sink when ever bored in winter. feel free to show pictures and gear used cheers. Shadowfly

st.lawrence river rideau river ottawa river bay of quinte ganaraska river wilmot creek cobourg creek temperance lake muskrat lake various trout ponds lako O out of credit river  looking foreward to trying  lake of 2 mountains lake st louis
I can't even count them, lol.
Jeeez, after close to 60 years of fishing I don't think my computer....or my memory.... is big enough to hold the names of all the lakes I've fished
ahhh come on BillM list what you can count lol
lew But your status is a fishing God im sure you can figure out how many lakes you fished .Give it a shot looking forward to finding out how many fished.

A gazillion. probably 40-60 in Algonquin Park alone. I just look at maps, see a lake, then try to get to it and fish it. I guess its alot different for us then folks from the south who tend to fish the great lakes.
a gazillion , damn if i had that much in dollars, id buy every OFNer fishing rod. 7 beers in the count so far
I think Shadowfly should tell us how many lakes he's fished
ChrisK 3 lakes so far. soon to be more by next week with photos after 5 day Algonquin park trip

Well, my biggest musky came from the St. Lawrence, my biggest bass came from the Kawarthas and my favorite place to fish is the West Arm of Nippissing  Now count how many lakes are within a couple hundred miles of   that tri-angle and it may be pretty close
LOL OK lew I'll give it a shot I'll get back to you in a year.
I travel a lot, so I'm kind of like a lake hore... I've tried nearly everyone I've seen, but they were not all good, and I regret a few of them.
but at least you didnt have to chew your arm off when you found out what you woke up next to...
Where you going in the park?
Haha. One of them even gave me beaver fever.... Its nothing like disco fever. ... And yes I know, I'm supposed to fish the waters not drink them haha.
lost count....I add 4-5 new ones every year
